name: vscode-versionlens
description: Shows the latest version for each package using code lens
author: Peter Flannery
keywords: npm, dub, dotnet, nuget, jspm, csharp, fsharp, c#, f#, java, maven, pub, dart, composer

commands.title: An error has occurred. See log for details.

editor/title.when: versionlens.enabled == false && versionlens.providerActive && versionlens.providerBusy == false && versionlens.providerError == false && textCompareEditorVisible == false
versionlens.enabled && versionlens.providerActive && versionlens.providerBusy == false && versionlens.providerError == false  && textCompareEditorVisible == false
versionlens.providerBusy && versionlens.providerActive && versionlens.providerError == false && textCompareEditorVisible == false
versionlens.prereleasesEnabled == false && versionlens.enabled && versionlens.providerActive && versionlens.providerSupportsPrereleases && textCompareEditorVisible == false
versionlens.prereleasesEnabled && versionlens.enabled && versionlens.providerActive && versionlens.providerSupportsPrereleases && textCompareEditorVisible == false

versionlens.suggestions.showOnStartup.description: Show version suggestions by default on vscode start up.

versionlens.suggestions.showPrereleasesO.description: Show version prerelease suggestions by default on vscode start up.

versionlens.logging.level.description: Sets the level of logs to be written to the VersionLens output channel. Vscode needs to be restarted for this to take effect.

versionlens.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached. Setting the duration to 0 will disable caching.

versionlens.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned.

versionlens.npm.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.npm.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned. Overrides 'versionlens.http.strictSSL'

versionlens.npm.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which properties in package.json should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.npm.distTagFilter.description: Define which common dist tags you want to see. i.e. [alpha, beta]. If you don't specify any dist tags then all the dist-tags for a package will be shown.

versionlens.pub.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.pub.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned. Overrides 'versionlens.http.strictSSL'

versionlens.pub.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which properties in pubspec.yaml should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.pub.apiUrl.description: Defines the pub api to use for package searching.

versionlens.dotnet.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.dotnet.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned. Overrides 'versionlens.http.strictSSL'

versionlens.dotnet.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which properties in project.json should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.dotnet.tagFilter.description: Define which common tagged versions you want to see. i.e. [alpha, beta]. If you don't specify any dist tags then all the dist-tags for a package will be shown.

versionlens.dotnet.nuget.sources.description: Defines which nuget source to use for package searching. Has to be a v3 'service index' endpoint. e.g. https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json. Defaults to the sources output by `dotnet nuget list source`

versionlens.dub.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.dub.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned. Overrides 'versionlens.http.strictSSL'

versionlens.dub.apiUrl.description: Defines the api to use for dub package searching.

versionlens.dub.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which properties in dub.json should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.composer.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.composer.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned. Overrides 'versionlens.http.strictSSL'

versionlens.composer.apiUrl.description: Defines the api to use for composer package searching.

versionlens.composer.dependencyPropertie.description: Defines which properties in composer.json should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.maven.caching.duration.description: Specifies how long (in minutes) version suggestions will be cached.

versionlens.maven.http.strictSSL.description: When set to 'true' the server will reject any connection which is not authorized within the list of supplied CAs. Set to false for unsigned. Overrides 'versionlens.http.strictSSL'

versionlens.maven.apiUrl.description: Defines the api to use for maven package searching.

versionlens.maven.dependencyProperties.description: Defines which properties in pom.xml should be parsed by this extension

versionlens.github.accessToken.description: Used for making basic read only github api requests. To generate a token see https://help.github.com/articles/creating-an-access-token-for-command-line-use/#creating-a-token. When no token is provided then access to the github api is rate limited to 60 requests every 10 minutes or so.
